content:
Replacing the bathroom trash can is unlikely to be related to the high water bill, so you can scratch that off your list of potential causes.

By asking the plumbers to inspect the rest of the pipes in the bathroom, you'll be taking a proactive approach to maintaining your plumbing system. It's always better to be safe than sorry, and catching any potential issues early on can save you a lot of time, money, and stress in the long run.

Remember to also ask the plumbers about any maintenance tips or recommendations they may have to help prevent future issues. They may have some valuable insights or suggestions to share, and it's always a good idea to learn from their expertise.

Now, go ahead and get those quotes from the plumbers, and don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or concerns. You got this!
